tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ip_blacklist (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  ip_address INET,
  reason TEXT,
  blocked_at TIMESTAMP,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT current_timestamp
)

CREATE TABLE fraudulent_activities (
   activity_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   ip_address VARCHAR(15),
   activity_type VARCHAR(50),
   activity_date TIMESTAMP,
   FOREIGN KEY (ip_address) REFERENCES blacklisted_ip_addresses(ip_address)
);

CREATE TABLE user_comments (
   comment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   ip_address VARCHAR(15),
   comment TEXT,
   comment_date TIMESTAMP,
   FOREIGN KEY (ip_address) REFERENCES blacklisted_ip_addresses(ip_address)
);

CREATE TABLE blacklisted_ips (
    ip_address VARCHAR(15) PRIMARY KEY,
    reason TEXT,
    date_added TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE fraudulent_activities (
    activity_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    ip_address VARCHAR(15) REFERENCES blacklisted_ips(ip_address),
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    activity_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE reports (
    report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    ip_address VARCHAR(15) REFERENCES blacklisted_ips(ip_address),
    report_description TEXT,
    reporter_name VARCHAR(100),
    report_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    action_type VARCHAR(50),
    ip_address VARCHAR(15) REFERENCES blacklisted_ips(ip_address),
    log_details TEXT,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
